name: Jack & Kenne
storyline: An artist's boss calls her at night and tells her to create a comic aimed at teenagers and wants to see the comic in the morning at her desk or she will be fired from her job, so she sees that she doesn't have much time, draws an alligator called Jack, and writes a plot in a hurry, which will be Jack trying to save Kenne Hoop from the terrible Markos the deer, Jack will have to face all of Markos' henchmen to get his girlfriend Kenne back.
summary: Jack and Kenne is a Beat up, which takes place in a comic book, the player will control an Alligator named Jack and he intends to save Kenne the Rabbit, she was kidnapped by Marcos the Deer!! Jack will have to go from page to page facing Marcos' gang to save Kenne.
